title: Land for Sale in Boralasgamuwa
location: Meti Suddhagara Road (Kaolin Refinery Rd), Boralesgamuwa, Boralesgamuwa
details:
Land for Sale in Boralasgamuwa

9.2 perch land within Boralesgamuwa city limit in a residential area with good surroundings is for sale.
Property Features:

Clear title deeds
Suitable for 1 to 4 story house
Two sides’ road access
Within 300 m to Colombo-Horana Road
Close proximity to Banks, Schools, and Super Markets
Close to walking and cycling track
Few minutes’ Drive to Colombo City
